entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support for SxS workload manifests #32236
  • Issue with NU1505 during upgrade to .NET 8 #32234
  • Why is the launch profile not being passed into `dotnet watch run` correctly? #32233
  • Strange errors in .NET SDK 7.0.105 ppc64le #32215
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205

Closed

  • EnableAotAnalyzer=true should also default EnableSingleFileAnalyzer=true #31284
  • dotnet pack randomly fails with exit code 139 when packing with symbol packages (snupkg): Ubuntu 18.04 x64 #12298
  • Errors restoring runtime pack #32038

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #32225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable preview branch codeflow going forward #32161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add more knobs to control upload chunk size, and if parallel upload s… #32080
    Area-Containers
  • Add AssemblyName metadata to references based on FrameworkList.xml #32213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-04 CTL #32200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.DiffPlex from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /eng/dependabot #31984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add debian to the SupportsTargetFramework logic. #32127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.0 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
